content: ध्मा {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (धमति, ध्मात; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} ध्मापयति) {@--1@} To blow, breathe out, exhale. {@--2@} To blow (as a wind-instrument), produce sound by blowing; शंखं दधमौ प्रतापवान् <ls>Bg. 1. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 1.">18</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 63</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 34</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">17. 7.</ls> {@--3@} To blow a fire, excite fire by blowing, excite sparks; को धमेच्छांतं च पावकं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} To manufacture by blowing. {@--5@} To cast, blow, or throw away.
